SELECT r.* FROM (SELECT rownum rn, t.* FROM (SELECT ct.ct_no, ct.cust_no, c.cust_name, get_codename(ct.ct_stat) as ct_stat_name, ct.ct_stat, ct.ct_start_dt, ct.ct_end_dt, ct.ct_amt, ct.use_mod_cnt, ct.max_emps, ct.cur_emps, ct.ct_file FROM ct ct JOIN cust c ON (ct.cust_no = c.cust_no) WHERE ct.cust_no NOT IN '0000'
ORDER BY ${ctSort},cust_no ) t WHERE rownum <= (#{page} * 10)) r WHERE r.rn > (#{page} -1) * 10
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ct ct JOIN cust c ON (ct.cust_no = c.cust_no)

SELECT ct.ct_no, get_codename(ct.ct_stat) as ct_stat, ct.cust_no, c.cust_name, c.brn, c.rep, ct.ct_file, ct.ct_start_dt, ct.ct_end_dt, ct.ct_amt, ct.use_mod_cnt, ct.max_emps, ct.cur_emps FROM ct ct JOIN cust c ON(ct.cust_no = c.cust_no) WHERE ct.ct_no = #{ctNo}
SELECT m.mod_id, m.mod_name, m.mod_stat, m.mod_info FROM use_mod um JOIN mod m ON (um.mod_id = m.mod_id) WHERE um.mod_use_stat = '1B1b' AND um.ct_no = #{ctNo}
SELECT e.emp_id, e.email_addr, e.emp_name, j.job_title, p.perm_name FROM emp e JOIN jobs j ON(e.job_no = j.job_no) JOIN perm p ON(j.perm_id = p.perm_id) WHERE e.cust_no = #{custNo}
SELECT mod_id, mod_name, get_codename(mod_stat) as mod_stat, mod_info FROM mod ORDER BY mod_id
mapper.update: UPDATE ct SET cust_no = #{custNo}, ct_start_dt = #{ctStartDt}, ct_end_dt = #{ctEndDt}, ct_amt = #{ctAmt}, use_mod_cnt = #{useModCnt}, max_emps = #{maxEmps}, cur_emps = #{curEmps}, ct_file = #{ctFile} WHERE ct_no = #{ctNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ct_hist (ct_hist_no, ct_no, ct_start_dt, ct_end_dt, ct_amt, use_mod_cnt, max_emps, cust_no) SELECT (SELECT NVL(MAX(ct_hist_no), 0) + 1 AS ct_hist_no FROM ct_hist), ct_no, ct_start_dt, ct_end_dt, ct_amt, use_mod_cnt, max_emps, cust_no FROM ct WHERE ct_no = #{ctNo}

SELECT NVL(MAX(mod_hist_no), 0) + 1 as mod_hist_no FROM use_mod
INSERT INTO use_mod ( mod_hist_no, mod_id, ct_no, cust_no, cust_name, use_start_dt, mod_use_stat ) VALUES ( #{modHistNo}, #{modId}, #{ctNo}, #{custNo}, #{custName}, #{useStartDt}, '1B1b' )
mapper.update: UPDATE use_mod SET use_end_dt = sysdate, mod_use_stat = '1B2b' WHERE use_end_dt IS NULL AND ct_no = #{ctNo}
